nicoR.name: Nicolas Rabault
nicoR.desc: Former roboticist, research engineer in real-time embedded systems and founder of Pollen Robotics; Nicolas Rabault is CEO of Luos. Nicolas dedicated his life to develop tools making embedded things work together and simplifying reusability.

thomas.name: Thomas Salembier
thomas.desc: Today CTO of Luos, Thomas as a background of Electronic and embedded software engineer with more than 12 years of experience in various fields of industry such as space, aeronautics, automotive and the medical.

viktoria.name: Viktoria
viktoria.desc: Former roboticist, research engineer in real-time embedded systems and founder of Pollen Robotics; Nicolas Rabault is CEO of Luos. Nicolas dedicated his life to develop tools making embedded things work together and simplifying reusability.

nicoC.name: Nicolas
nicoC.desc: Former roboticist, research engineer in real-time embedded systems and founder of Pollen Robotics; Nicolas Rabault is CEO of Luos. Nicolas dedicated his life to develop tools making embedded things work together and simplifying reusability.

jerome.name: Jerome Galan
jerome.desc: After various hard/soft developments and integrations in real-time embedded systems for robotics, railway and radio communications, Jérôme Galan now works on Luos Software Quality Assurance.
